title: Dai-kun wa Hitori de Nerarenai
original_name: 橙くんはひとりで寝られない
sinopse:
Riko was looking forward to the arrival of her neighbor and childhood friend from 6 years ago. Her memories of him were of a handsome and friendly boy who always took care of her. But for some reason, the gentle boy she knew seems to have changed into a different person now.

(Source: MU)
